greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n plus the number of its prime factors: a(n) = n + A001222(n).
comment: Prime factors counted with multiplicity. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 19 2015
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b064800.txt", n, " ", n + bigomega(n)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 26 2009
a064800 n = a001222 n + n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 27 2012
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 21 2001
